data.name: Neighboring Islands - soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Music written by talented Russian authors, exclusively for the game "Neighboring Islands", not inferior to the atmosphere of the best Hollywood blockbusters! Feel like a real pirate!

Track list:

  • Neighbouring Islands - Main theme
  • Neighbouring Islands - Tavern theme
  • Neighbouring Islands - Storm theme
  • Neighbouring Islands - Attack theme
  • Neighbouring Islands - Jungle theme
  • Neighbouring Islands - Village theme

data.short_description: Atmospheric music from the game The Neighboring Islands
